mapper.select: select a.styling_name as styling_name , a.styling_price as styling_price from styling a inner join reservation_detail b on a.styling_num = b.styling_num where rest_num = #{rest_num}
select * from styling where des_num = #{des_num} ORDER BY styling_option
mapper.insert: select styling_seq.nextval from dual INSERT INTO styling(styling_num , des_num, styling_name, styling_price, styling_option) VALUES(#{styling_num}, #{des_num}, #{styling_name},#{styling_price},#{styling_option})
